newsItems.title: Breakthrough in Anxiety Treatment with Mindfulness Therapy
newsItems.summary: A recent study highlights how mindfulness-based therapy has become an effective treatment for reducing anxiety symptoms and improving mental well-being.

newsItems.title: The Effects of Social Media on Anxiety in Young Adults
newsItems.summary: Research shows a growing connection between social media use and rising anxiety levels in young adults, prompting calls for more digital wellness initiatives.

newsItems.title: Managing Anxiety: A Look at Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
newsItems.summary: CBT remains one of the most effective approaches for treating anxiety disorders, offering tools for coping and long-term management.
